message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.xml.stream.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.InputStream' import. Should be before 'javax.xml.stream.*'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'javax.xml.stream.*'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Collection' import. Should be before 'javax.xml.stream.*'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'javax.xml.stream.*'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Optional' import. Should be before 'javax.xml.stream.*'.
'+' should be on a new line.
